summary: A Seattle weather girl freaks out on-air over her cheating boyfriend, the morning show anchor, and moves in with her little brother.
cast: Tricia O'Kelley|Patrick J. Adams|Ryan Devlin|Mark Harmon|Kaitlin Olson|Alex Kapp|Marin Hinkle|Jon Cryer|Jane Lynch|Brandon Barrera|Brett Butler|Enrico Colantoni|Amie Donegan|Timothy Dvorak|Lucas Fleischer|David Giuntoli|Rob Helms|Bubba Lewis|Omar Leyva|J.P. Manoux|Melinda McGraw|J.D. Nielsen|Joe Nunez|Kit Pongetti|Meredith Roberts Quill|Adam Rosenblatt|Jamie Rosenblatt|Danny Strong|Hal Tryon|Blayne Weaver|Blair Underwood
title: La chica del tiempo
